xwikidoc.name: WebHome
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.jkl1231
xwikidoc.content: 1 Administration 1.1 XWiki Preferences * Global Settings * [Panels>Panels.WebHome] * [Check Server Status>Admin.RequestsStatus] 1.1 User Administration * [PagedUsers] ## * [Users>XWiki.XWikiUsers] * [Groups Albotros>XWiki.XWikiGroups?editor=groups&space=XWiki&force=1&skin=albotros] * [Groups>XWiki.XWikiGroups] * [XWiki.AdminGroup?skin=toucan]: Add or Remove Admins * [Rights>Admin.Rights] * [Search for Users>Admin.UserSearch] 1.1 Blog * [Categories>Blog.Categories] * [Article Sheet>XWiki.ArticleClassSheet] * [Article Template>XWiki.ArticleClassTemplate] ##1.1 Photos ## ##* [Photo Album Sheet>XWiki.PhotoAlbumClassSheet] ##* [Photo Album Template>XWiki.PhotoAlbumClassTemplate] 1.1 Rss * [RSS Feed>Main.WebRss?xpage=rdf] * [Blog RSS Feed>Main.BlogRss?xpage=rdf] 1.1 Presentation * [Menu>XWiki.Menu]: Menu on the left * [Toolbar>XWiki.Toolbar]: Toolbar on the right * [Skin>XWiki.MySkin]: Skin * [CurrikiSkin2>XWiki.CurrikiSkin2]: Skin2 * [CurrikiSkin Macro Page>Admin.R2SkinMacros]: Macro Documentation * [Edit dev skin CurrikiSkin8dev>http://next.dev.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/inline/XWiki/CurrikiSkin8dev] ##1.1 Tests ##* [CurrikiSkin2Test>XWiki.CurrikiSkin2Test] Test 1.1 Cache * [Memory Status>Admin.MemoryStatus] * [Requests Status>Admin.RequestsStatus] * [Flush Cache>Admin.FlushCache] 1.1 Asset Temp * [XWiki.clean assetTemp] 1.1 All Assets and Special Lists ##* [Admin.AssetList] * Asset List Disabled Until Fixed 10/25/07 * [CRS Review Queue: Nominations>CRS.Reviews]: Reviews Pending in the Queue * [File Check List>FileCheck.WebHome]: All Repository Files in the BFCS Tool * [File Check Exclude List>FileCheck.ExcludeList]: Add Login Names to this list to remove their collections from File Check. Production only. * To see files marked as deleted in File Check, login as "Delete", password = "filecheck" * [Delete Groups>Admin.GroupDelete] Caution: No Undo * [Users - Activate / Deactivate / Delete>Admin.MemberDelete] Caution: No Undo on Delete 1.1 Lucene * [Admin.Lucene]: Search or Refresh Index * [Admin.LuceneFullReindex]: Reindex All Documents: *Do not go here unless you have checked with David and Joshua* 1.1 Search * [Main.SearchResources] * [Main.Search] * [List All Spaces in Curriki>Admin.Spaces] * [List All Spaces in Curriki minus Groups>Admin.SpacesNoGroups] * [How to Find All Pages in a Space>Admin.SpacePages]: Such as Main 1.1 Display String Look-Up Pages (AKA Translation Text) * [Compare Tool>Admin.Translations]: For the Pages Below * [Translations>XWiki.Translations]: Left Menu Bar, Search, Edit Profile, More * [GWT>XWiki.CurrikiGWTTranslation]: This is basically moot (and empty) now. * [CRS>CRS.Translations]: Curriki Review System * [Registration>Registration.Translations]: Registration, Profile * [File Check>FileCheck.Translations]: File Check Pages, but not eMails * [MyCurriki>MyCurriki.Translations] Other elements are also in Translations and Registration * [Groups>Groups.Translations] * [To Translate>XWiki.ToTranslate]: Appears to be some old page that Todd needs to review and delete. * [Forms & Add Path>CreateResources.Translations] * [Search and Browse Translation>Search.Translations] * [CurrikiCode.EditViewTranslations] * [XWiki.GlobalClassTranslations]: Pulling out Class / Frameworks from other translations into this one. This will remove a lot of duplication. 1.1 Documentation * [Project Pages>http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Project/WebHome]: Located on www.curriki.org * [Group Pages>http://next.dev.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Groups/Documentation] 1.1 Deployment * [Push Page>Admin.PageList] * [Push Page Removals>Admin.PageListRemovals] * [Programming Rights> Admin.GiveProgRights] 1.1 Change Language * [Main.WorldLanguages]: Page on Next for Switching Languages * [Show Bahasa>WebHome?language=id]: id * [Show English>WebHome?language=en]: en * [Show Hindi>WebHome?language=hi]: hi * [Show French>WebHome?language=fr]: fr * [Show Russian>WebHome?language=ru]: ru * [Show Spanish>WebHome?language=es]: es 1.1 Partner Registration * [Documentation>Affiliate.WebHome] * [Add / Modify / Delete Partners>Affiliate.AffiliateManagement] 1.1 Site Index List These pages are used to determin what get's indexed for Curriki's Site Map. The site map is used by search engines. [Sitemap.xml>Admin.SiteMap?xpage=plain] - Warning! Large File! Long Loading time! * [Admin.SiteMapExcludeSpace] - Any space listed here will not be included * [Admin.SiteMapExcludePage] - Any specific (full-name) page listed here will not be included * [Admin.SiteMapExcludeName] - Any page from any space with this name will not be included (such as "WebPreferences" from all spaces) 1.1 Google Ad Words Landing Page * [ How to Create an Ad Word Landing Page>AdWordsJump.WebHome]: Documentation * [ Google Ads Tracking>AdWordsJump.LandingPageLog ] * [ Example Ad > AdWordsJump.FreeWorksheet?xpage=popup] * [ Translations >AdWordsJump.Translations]
